title: Poster, Vivaldi, Fauré, DeFalla, Wagner Program - Yale Bach Society Chamber Orchestra, ca. 1970
title_raw: Vivaldi, Fauré, DeFalla, Wagner Program - Yale Bach Society Chamber Orchestra
inscribed: Imprinted in blue lower right corner: Friday May 4 / Sprague Hall 8:30 / Free. At upper center and right: Yale Bach Society Chamber Orchestra / William Harwood,  / conductor
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Powder blue and green letters and underlines spaced across a white background. Text reads from upper center down the sheet: Vivaldi: / Concerto for Two Oboes / James Ryon / Roger Cole / soloists. At right: Fauré: / Incidental music for Péllas et Méllisande.  At center: De Falla: / Three Cornered Hat / Suite No. 1. At lower left: Wagner: / Siegfried Idyll.  The green underlinings thicken into rectangles at the bottom of the sheet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, Vivaldi, Fauré, DeFalla, Wagner Program - Yale Bach Society Chamber Orchestra, ca. 1970. Screenprint on white wove paper. 
Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-271.
